sentences.en: ‘How old’s Sam?’ ‘He’s seven (= seven years old ) .’
Alex didn't read fluently till he was nearly seven.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯快到7岁时才能流利地阅读。

sentences.en: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.cn: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

sentences.en: He had been going out with his girlfriend for seven months.
sentences.cn: 他同女朋友已经交往7个月了。

sentences.en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He was about seven years old, small and fine-boned like his mother.
sentences.cn: 他大概7岁，骨架像他妈妈一样娇小均匀。

sentences.en: More than a quarter of seven year-olds cannot add up properly.
sentences.cn: 7岁的孩子中1/4以上都不会正确地做加法运算。

sentences.en: Offenders will be liable to a seven-year prison term.
Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentences.cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentences.en: Rain washed out five of the last seven games.
sentences.cn: 由于下雨，最后的7场比赛取消了5场。

sentences.en: Sarah and Ella have been friends for seven years.
sentences.cn: 萨拉和埃拉已经有7年的交情了。

sentences.en: The video was seven minutes of high camp and melodrama.
sentences.cn: 那段录像里是7分钟极尽夸张搞笑的闹剧表演。

sentences.en: The women visited cities in seven states.
sentences.cn: 这些女性访问了七个州的城市。

sentences.en: Their unit was shelling the German lines only seven miles away.
sentences.cn: 他们的部队在炮轰仅有7英里之遥的德军防线。

sentences.en: There is tension in the region following the killing of seven civilians.
sentences.cn: 随着7名平民被杀害，该地区局势紧张起来。

sentences.en: There was a blackboard with seven names chalked on it.
sentences.cn: 黑板上用粉笔写着7个人名。

sentences.en: These chaps know their stuff after seven years of war.
sentences.cn: 7年的战争过后，这些家伙都成了作战行家。

sentences.en: We close the store at seven (= seven o’clock ) .

words.tran_cn: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的
第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的

phrases.tran_cn: n. （对统治和立法有贡献的）古代希腊七贤人
七姊妹（世界七大石油公司）；北斗星团
